attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KI0olkBQYwY9bWCrpeQ_content
attribs.current:
(A Gith's Mage Hand is invisible, and is cast through the mind.)

A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.

The hand can't attack, activate magical items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KI0rD95kjq3ZKuDoJAP_display_text
attribs.current: You have advantage on all saving throws against any effects that would charm or restrain you.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KI0rQrOwlxKenkkhYvP_display_text
attribs.current: You know the mage hand cantrip, though the hand is always invisible. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the jump spell once per long rest. These abilities count as Psionic, and the spellcasting ability for these spells is determined by your subrace.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KI0riLPvSO5oNLLZIZa_display_text
attribs.current: Once you reach 5th level, you can cast the misty step spell once per long rest. Once you reach 7th level, you may cast the nondetection spell once per long rest, targeting only yourself.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KICF8hkOkKR2QlxzOZb_display_text
attribs.current: At 1st level, you gain proficiency with martial weapons, heavy armor, and shields.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KICFR88ILiwZC739VgJ_display_text
attribs.current:
Focus: +1 to attack/damage of weapon. 
Attacks considered magical.

Ethereal weapon (1 Psi) - Bonus action - transform held weapon into psionic energy. The next attack you make requires no attack roll. Instead, target must make a Dex save against the attack. On a failed save, target takes the attack's normal damage. On a succesful save, the target takes half damage from the attack.

Lethal strike (1-5) -  Free action -When you hit a target with an attack, you can add 1d6 psychic damage for each point you spend. The Psychic damage added by this increases to 1d8 at 5th level, and 1d10 at 10th.

Augmented Weapon - Bonus action - For 10m a weapon gains +3 to attack and damage rolls.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KICHxaDaENKcwmeQw9-_display_text
attribs.current:
Psychic Focus - Passive, bonus action to switch - +1 to AC

Psionic Recovery (2)- Action - Spend up to two hit dice. Add con modifier to both rolls.

Iron Hide (1-3) - Reaction - When you are hit by an attack, spend psi points for +2 ac per pont. You spend these points after learning the attack's result (after attack roll) but before applying its effects (before the attack damages you).

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: Quietly arrogant. Can be slow to act, prefers to weigh all options.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: The freedom of his people and the eradication of the Iliithid. Protecting magic from those who would abuse it.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KICIrIm7ydpdAu2lZEC_display_text
attribs.current:
As a bonus action, you can communicate telepathically with one creature you can see within 120 feet of you. You dont need to share a language with a creature for it to understand your telepathic utterances, and the creature understands you even if it lacks a language. You can allow a
creature to respond to you telepathically, but it must understand at least one language in order to communicate this way. This ability to communicate lasts until the start of your next turn. You cant communicate with an unwilling creature.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KIPajsfXjyS39rhF5Z0_display_text
attribs.current:
You receive shelter and succor from members of your
knightly order and those who are sympathetic to its
aims. If your order is a religious one, you can gain aid
from temples and other religious communities of your
deity. Knights of civic orders can get help from the community-
whether a lone settlement or a great nationthat
they serve, and knights of philosophical orders can
find help from those they have aided in pursuit of their
ideals, and those who share those ideals.
This help comes in the form of shelter and meals, and
healing when appropriate, as well as occasionally risky
assistance, such as a band of local citizens rallying to

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KIPbwiNY2reGu9l3XwP_content
attribs.current:
Includes:

 a backpack

 a bedroll

 a mess kit

 a tinderbox

 [[10]] torches

 [[10]] days of rations

 a waterskin

 [[50]] feet of hempen rope
